1.content:
There are many beautiful choices from the cast of The Vampire Diaries. Will you choose one of the supernatural beings? A vampire? A werewolf? A hybrid? Or will you choose one of the humans? The choice is up to you. Will it be....

Stefan Salvatore- A broody, perpetually 17-year-old, vampire in love with the human Elena Gilbert? Stephan is romantic, protective, and survives on a diet of animal blood...most of the time.

Damon Salvatore- A charismatic, charming, and volatile vampire with a short fuse. Damon is Stefan's older brother and he, too, is in love with Elena Gilbert. Damon pretty much does whatever he wants whenever he wants. He tries to hide it, but he's still hurting over his long-lost love Katherine Pierce.

Elena Gilbert- The human love interest of both of the Salvatore brothers, Elena struggles to keep her cool while being in near-constant danger. She is older sister to Jeremy Gilbert and daughter to the late Grayson and Miranda. Elena is set-apart by her beauty and her kind heart, though it is her compassion which is touted as her greatest strength..

Bonnie Bennett- A powerful witch from a long line of witches who made it their mission to protect their friends and neighbors from the supernatural creatures preying upon Mystic Falls. Bonnie still struggles to control her powers and to navigate the gray moral landscape that is Mystic Falls. Bonnie is loyal to a fault and usually pays for it dearly.

Caroline Forbes- Perky, vivacious, and a bit neurotic, Caroline is the daughter of Sherriff Liz Forbes. Through the cunning and conniving actions of Katherine Pierce, Caroline was turned into a vampire and she managed to come out the other side of her transition a more confident, capable person.

Jeremy Gilbert- Jeremy is Elena's younger brother who had a difficult time in the wake of their parents' tragic death. Jeremy has been known to use drugs recreationally and has an artistic side. Despite his sister's best efforts, Jeremy discovered the truth about vampires living in Mystic Falls and the supernatural creatures and events have added major complications to his love-life.

Matt Donovan- Matt is the boy-next-door and Elena's long-time friend and ex-boyfriend. Matt is the heart of his circle of friends and a loyal friend. He is also struggling to support himself in the absence of his flighty mother, Kelly.

Tyler Lockwood- Tyler grew up as the son of the mayor of Mystic Falls. He is a werewolf who learned of his family's curse shortly before he turned. Tyler has a mean-streak, but is good-hearted and loyal when it counts.


Will you choose....
1.title: Choose Your Character!

11.content: Will you choose Elena? Bonnie? Caroline? One of the other lovely ladies of Mystic Falls?
11.title: One of the girls?

12.content: Will you choose Stefan? Damon? Jeremy? Matt? Tyler? Or one of the other gorgeous guys of Mystic Falls?
12.title: Or one of the guys?

info.brief_description: This is a weight gain story for fans of the CW TV series The Vampire Diaries. Enjoy.
info.description:
This is an interactive story which will allow anyone who wants to to read and write about characters from the Vampire Diaries TV show on the CW gaining weight/ getting fat. Yes, this is a very specific kind of story for a very specific kind of person. This is also a unique story, for nowhere else on the internet does there exist a Vampire Diaries weight gain story (believe me, I've scoured the internet looking for one). So, please read, write, add, and enjoy! Both male and female weight gain will be allowed here, though I'm just in it for the boys. I do have a few ground rules:

1. Please no vore. I know this is a vampire story, so some blood-sucking is okay, but no people eating people.
2. Sex is okay, but try not to get too graphic and don't just shoe-horn it in there. It needs to make sense for the characters/ plot.
3. Please try to add at least one paragraph per chapter, single-sentence entries are no-fun
4. You may add new characters to the Mystic Falls universe.
5. Try to keep the weight gain realistic (please no 'so and so gained 1000 pounds in one day!').
6: Please try to use correct spelling, grammar, and punctuation.
7: No spoilers from the current season. I don't want this to ruin anything for people who aren't current.
8: Have fun and be creative!
info.pretty_title: The Vampire Diaries (TV Show) WG Story!
